#summary Posterior Eye Field
@@[Home] -> [BiologicalLifeResearch] -> [BrainAreaNPE] -> [BrainRegionNPE_NC_IPS_PEF]
----

This page covers biological details of component Posterior Eye Field.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Cortex -> Parietal Lobe (NC.LOBE.PAR) -> Intraparietal Sulcus (NSA.NC.IPS) -> Posterior Eye Field (NPE.NC.IPS.PEF) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: cortex
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaNPE Neocortical Brain - Polymodal Execution Area]
  * *Brodmann ID*: 39
  * *Role*: processor
  * *Function*: Reflexive saccade triggering

= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Medial Intraparietal Sulcus* (*NSA.NC.IPS.MIP*): Encode location of reach target in nose-centered coordinates
  * *Lateral Intraparietal Sulcus* (*NSA.NC.IPS.LIP*): Representing saliency of spatial locations, and attention to locations
